snippet.title: Silence for Nintendo Switch - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Daedalic Entertainment is delighted to announce that the fan-favourite adventure game Silence is out now on Nintendo Switch!

-- About the Game --
Can you save Silence, the grim, but also serene world between life and death? Can you help Noah find his little sister Renie in this suffering world? Can you bring her home? Explore Silence and join the siblings on their adventurous journey. 

-- Follow us on Social Media -- 
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/daedalic 
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/daedalic 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/daedalicentertainment

https://www.daedalic.com
